g.text: send the covid-19 report to the NHS
define the date to see the report (dateToSee), the interval of dates, the number of historical day/weeks points (histPoints),
select between a simple linear and multilinear regression model, independent variables (i.e.: meanAge, dailyNumberTests) and define the significance level
types and selects the requested data
[if the user chooses simple linear regression]
[if the user chooses daily number tests]
arrayX can be dailyNumberTests or meanAge
